fulltext:
E23, 11-03 Belleza Apartment, Phạm Hữu Lầu Street  
 Phú Mỹ Ward, District 7, HCM City - Vietnam 
Mobile: 0903 650 005 | Email: thuyduong245@gmail.com 
DOB: May 24th, 1982 | Female | Vietnamese | Married 
CAREER OBJECTIVES  
To be an effective contributors in team, creating and working in a professional environment where I 
could learn and develop my managerial skills and at the same time support my colleagues to be successful in 
their careers and lives. 
PROFILE  
✓ Various experience in FMCG Sales Operation and Planner, Contruction Operation and Real-Estate Sales 
Person, foods and beverage management. Area of focus: Planning and Operation Management. 
✓ Sound educational background and effective communication skills. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCES 
Duong’s Kitchen    
                      Feb, 2018 – May,2019 
Position: Owner and Operation Manager 
Setup and operate Duong’s Kitchen specialize in Central authentic foods in Phu My Hung area. 
UNILEVER VIETNAM International Company Ltd.,                                                       Feb, 2011 – Feb, 2018 
Position:  
Category Operation Assistant Manager - MT & DT 
Categories:  Hair Care, Deodorant, Oral Care and House Hold Cleaning 
Channel: 
Modern Trade and Distributive (Gentral) Trade 
Responsibilities:  
✓ Planning: strong in demand planning; decision maker of baseline and consolidate total forecast; consult 
in promotion effectiveness, trade activities traffic control; leading destock plan with trade marketing and 
sales, launch - relaunch check-list controller. 
✓ Operation management: leading the operation process; gate keeper and operator for flawless execution 
in plan – target – delivery and financial monitor accordingly; focus on stock, promotion and 
implementation. Prepared sale reports. Make allocation by region by key accounts.  
✓ Analysis: tracking, generate insights based on historical data and on-field practice, contribute to decision 
making process, ensure lessons leanred and improve next phase of planning and execution. 
✓ Key co-ordinator in cross-functions management: field sales – trade marketing - marketing – supply chain 
– financial and human resource to ensure all plan can implement well. 
✓ Monitor channel operation and distribution ROI performance.  
COTEC Contruction Joint Stock Company [COTECCONS]                                          May, 2006 – Nov, 2010 
Position: Project Assistant Director 
Projects: 
• 
Saigon Pearl Residence Project – District 1, HCMC 
• 
Gemadept Office Building Project – District 1, HCMC 
• 
River Garden Residence Project – District 2, HCMC 
• 
The Kenton Residence Project – Nha Be District, HCMC 
Responsibilities: 
✓ Responsible for entire administration works at Site Management Board. Managing all project related 
document for team leaders to manage construction progress. Support contructions operation progress. 
✓ Responsible for purchasing construction material and light equipments, including manging 
subcontractors, negotiation, and delivery schedule. 
✓ Responsible for managing manpower of various contruction team in projects, including worksheet, labor 
contract and payroll. 
✓ Responsible for managing material and light equipment warehouse, including financial. 
✓ Responsible for managing project expenditures, including project financial accounts and P&L. 
ĐỊA LỢI Real Estate Joint Stock Company           
                                             Oct, 2004 – May, 2006 
Position: Salesperson 
Responsibility: 
✓ Search, follow up and post project information on showroom. Cum admins work. 
✓ Introduce, consult products, services to potential customers 
✓ Manage and conduct customer care services. Cum treasure and debit note. 
EDUCATION 
University of Economics HCMC, Vietnam                                          
       (2005 - 2007) 
Degree: Bachelor of Commerce – Business Administration 
University of Finance and Marketing, HCMC, Vietnam                                          
     (December, 2004) 
The training course in Real Estate Business   
University of Finance and Marketing, HCMC, Vietnam                   
 (2001 - 2004) 
Colleges Degree – Business Administration 
OTHER ACTIVITIES 
✓ Participated in every charity activities such as flood relief in Central Region and annually raising fund for 
disadvantage people. Participated board of charity to help poor childrens. 
✓ Organized events for team: team building, year end party, outside meeting…. 
PROFESSIONAL SKILLS, LANGUAGES AND COMPUTER  
English (verbal and written): Moderate 
Effective Communication  
Microsoft Office and Internet 
Problem Solving and Decision Making 
Analytical & Logical Thinking 
Research & Negotiation. 
REFERENCE 
✓ Mrs. Nguyen Thi Thu Hang  (Business Unit Director Haircare – Deodorant - Male Grooming, Unilever 
Vietnam)  - Contact: +84 914 398 366 
✓ Mrs. Pham Thi Kim Uyen (Senior Manager – Sales Transformation, Marico South East Asia Corporation) 
-  Contact: +84 908 403 363
